results.name: a(n) = (1/2)*(A325314(n) + A325814(n)).
comment: Question: Are a(12) = 0 and a(18) = 0 the only zeros in this sequence?
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: Table[(1/2) If[n == 1, 2, 2 n - DivisorSigma[1, n] + Times @@ (1 + FactorInteger[n][[;; , 1]]) - DivisorSum[n, # &, ! CoprimeQ[#, n/#] &]], {n, 85}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 06 2019 *)
program: A034448(n) = { my(f=factorint(n)); prod(k=1, #f~, 1+(f[k, 1]^f[k, 2])); }; \\ After code in A034448
